name: plan-semilla
description: Plan Semilla - Investment strategy PWA dashboard

scripts.build:www: rm -rf www && mkdir -p www && cp index.html manifest.json sw.js market_clock.js historical_data.js dashboard.html favicon.ico icon-192.png icon-512.png www/ && cp -r data www/
scripts.ios:sync: npm run build:www && npx cap sync ios
scripts.android:sync: npm run build:www && npx cap sync android

author: Lorenzo Lole
